price: 22. Markay Mu’minintu arkeen xizbiyadii (gaaladii isu soo baheystay) waxay yidhaahdeen: Kani waa waxay Alle iyo Rasuulkiisu noo yabooheen18, Alle iyo Rasuuliisuna run bay sheegeen, umana kordhin waxaan ahayen iimaan iyo hoggaansan.
arabic: وَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابَ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَصَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ وَمَا زَادَهُمۡ إِلَّآ إِيمَٰنٗا وَتَسۡلِيمٗا
footnotes: 18. Alle wuxuu u ballan qaaday Rasuulkiisa iyo mu’miniinta guul kaddib dhibka iyo shiddada. Waxaana la amray inay sugaan waxa uu Alle u yaboohay.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walammā raā al-mu'minūna al-aḥzāba qālū hādhā mā waʿadanā al-lahu warasūluhu waṣadaqa al-lahu warasūluhu wamā zādahum illā īmānan wataslīman
